elements.text:
TREMOR

Over the past week, have you usually had shaking or tremor?

buttons: 0::0: Normal: Not at all. I have no shaking or tremor.
1::1: Slight: Shaking or tremor occurs but does not cause problems with any activities.
2::2: Mild: Shaking or tremor causes problems with only a few activities.
3::3: Moderate: Shaking or tremor causes problems with many of my daily activities.
4::4: Severe: Shaking or tremor causes problems with most or all activities.
